articles.title: Popular online food delivery service opens first-ever physical store – and confirms plans for special events
articles.author: Louis Regan
articles.summary: FreshDirect introduced its first physical store in Southampton, New York, on May 23, 2024, as a pop-up location open until the end of 2025. Uber Eats is now using autonomous vehicles for deliveries, offering customers the option to opt-out.

articles.title: How AI is making the invisible visible in branding
articles.author: Sooyoung Cho
articles.summary: The brand consultancy "the bread and butter" is utilizing AI tools like DALL-E to develop new visual brand assets that represent sensory experiences such as touch, hearing, taste, smell, and sight. This new approach to sensory branding aims to enhance brand expression by translating intangible sensations into communicable designs, making brand experience more accessible and authentic.

articles.title: PopSocket finally caught up to 2025 with this accessory
articles.author: Patrick O'Rourke
articles.summary: PopSocket has launched the MagSafe Kick-Out Grip and Stand, an accessory designed for the vertical video era. The grip functions as both a MagSafe PopSocket and a sturdy stand for iPhones, supporting both vertical and horizontal orientations. It is available for $40 in various colors and is compatible with MagSafe iPhone cases and PopTop/PopMount customizations.

articles.title: A-MAY-ZING KIDS: 4-year-old stuns with all 50 states in ABC order
articles.author: Jessica Wills
articles.summary: Stanley offers a product suitable as a gift for Father's Day, potentially impressing Dad with its offering.

articles.title: Every Story's an Ad Now
articles.author: Bill Bradley
articles.summary: Warner Bros. Discovery is launching WBD Storyverse, a new service that provides partners access to its IP library, including titles like Harry Potter and Friends, for commercial purposes. This allows for the integration of these IPs into advertisements and other forms of content marketing.

articles.title: How AI Agents Are Transforming Reputation Management in 2025
articles.author: Featured Partner
articles.summary: GetDandy introduces an AI-driven platform for businesses to manage and enhance their online reputation. The platform offers online review removal, continuous online monitoring, compliance issue detection, and AI agents for customer review responses. GetDandy aims to empower businesses to control their narrative and safeguard their digital brands.

articles.title: Ranked: The Most Responsive, Quiet and Effective Automatic Soap Dispensers
articles.author: Danielle Murphy
articles.summary: The article features a review of various automatic soap dispensers available on the market.  It evaluates each dispenser based on responsiveness, soap amount dispensed, sound, aesthetics, and durability, with details on features like adjustable soap levels, self-cleaning modes, and battery life.  Brands mentioned include Gotofine and Simplehuman, among others.

articles.title: Here's the thing Apple gets right about platforms that Samsung would be smart to copy
articles.author: Lance Ulanoff
articles.summary: The Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra features OneUI 7 with deeply integrated Samsung Galaxy AI, Samsung Health, and the Now Brief Widget. OneUI includes the "Gallery" app with Generative AI image editing, along with the Sketch to Image feature. The phone also includes access to the Galaxy Store for Samsung Apps.

articles.title: Eyeing the Dyson Supersonic Nural Hair Dryer? It's Now at the Lowest Price I've Seen
articles.author: Macy Meyer
articles.summary: The Dyson Supersonic Nural hair dryer is currently on sale on Amazon for $399, which is a 20% discount from its usual $500 price. This is the product's lowest price yet, and the deal is for a limited time.

articles.title: Elden Ring: Nightreign: Global release date, time for PC and consoles and how to preload
articles.author: Global Desk
articles.summary: Elden Ring: Nightreign is launching this week, with PC access on May 29 at varying times based on region and console access at midnight local time on May 30. Preloading is available from May 28 for consoles and May 29 for PC via Steam, enabling players to start playing immediately upon release.

articles.title: Meet the Soap-Free Method That's Transforming Sensitive Skin
articles.summary: Sans Savon, a new luxe beauty brand, has launched soap-free formulations designed to cleanse without disrupting the skin's barrier. The brand's starter set, priced at $90, is available with a 30% discount and includes a complimentary body brush and body bar. The products utilize a micellar complex and other ingredients to cleanse effectively while protecting and strengthening the skin's moisture barrier.

articles.title: Boden dress has shoppers saying 'I feel like a million dollars' in UK heatwave
articles.author: Beth Mahoney
articles.summary: Boden has reduced the price of the Ivy Smocked Midi Dress to £58.80, originally priced at £98. The dress is available in petite and regular lengths, sizes four to 22, and has received positive reviews for its fit and design.

articles.title: Minister of Digital Economy opens Orange Jordan's data centre in Ain Al Basha
articles.author: //Petra// AK
articles.summary: Orange Jordan has opened a new data center in Ain Al Basha District, Balqa. The data center is designed with a modular, flexible, and scalable architecture and incorporates several innovative environmental solutions. The center can expand up to 500 racks and has a total capacity of 5 megawatts.

articles.title: Nissan's Future Lies in Its Past? Unpacking a Bold Revival Strategy
articles.author: Cole Attisha
articles.summary: Nissan is considering introducing new models inspired by past concept cars to broaden its market appeal. The brand is exploring models such as a hybrid coupe inspired by the 2005 Nissan Azeal, an off-roader concept inspired by the Nissan Judo, and a rear-wheel drive sport coupe inspired by the IDx concepts, and an electrified Minivan prototype. These models aim to target neglected market segments and rejuvenate Nissan's reputation for innovation.

articles.title: Mitsubishi UFJ to Launch New Digital Financial Service Brand
articles.summary: Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc. is launching a new brand for digital financial services on Monday. This launch involves revamping a mobile banking app and unifying multiple services including credit card and securities.

articles.title: Jeffs' Brands Prepares for Official Launch of Fort's AI-Based Pest Control App on the Apple iOS and Android Platforms  May. 27, 2025 18:11
articles.summary: Jeffs' Brands Ltd is launching the 'Fort' app, an AI-powered pest control mobile application. The app, developed by Fort Products Limited, offers AI-driven pest identification and tailored treatment recommendations and is available on the Apple App Store, with the Android version pending approval on Google Play.

articles.title: Popular Filipino fast food chain's Oregon debut is fast approaching
articles.author: Jashayla Pettigrew
articles.summary: Jollibee is opening a new location in Hillsboro, Oregon on May 30, offering dine-in and drive-thru service. The opening includes promotions like free Chickenjoy buckets for the first customers and other giveaways on subsequent days. Online orders will launch in the coming weeks.

articles.title: HotDeals Enhances Merchant Page with New Coupons and Deals Details Feature
articles.summary: HotDeals has launched updates to its merchant pages to enhance user experience. The update introduces a new feature for displaying comprehensive information about coupons and deals directly on the merchant page. This allows customers to easily discover and take advantage of the latest offers.

articles.title: Dyson's powerful Supersonic Nural Hair Dryer is on sale for 20% off
articles.author: Brandt Ranj
articles.summary: Dyson has launched the Supersonic Nural Hair Dryer, equipped with sensors to adjust temperature based on scalp proximity and attachment type. The hair dryer features a Hyperdymium motor for efficient drying and includes multiple attachments for diverse hair types. It also offers smart settings that learn user preferences over time.

articles.title: The 12 Best Sneakers of 2025 (So Far)
articles.author: Christine Flammia
articles.summary: Hoka has released the Hoka x Marni Bondi sneaker, a new take on a comfortable shoe. New Balance has launched a collaboration with Stone Island, resulting in muted brown sneakers. Nike and Salomon have also introduced new futuristic and ombré-pink sneakers, respectively.

articles.title: Nuuly just made fashion rentals profitable — Here's how
articles.author: Fast Company
articles.summary: Nuuly, Urban Outfitters' clothing rental service, has undergone changes after six years of operation. This suggests a product update or new service offering within the existing platform.

articles.title: McDonald's pulls the plug on beverage-focused CosMc's
articles.author: Chris Morris
articles.summary: McDonald's has decided to discontinue its CosMc's beverage-focused concept. This concept was designed to test new flavors, technologies, and processes. The aim of this concept was to not disrupt the existing McDonald's experience for customers and crew.

articles.title: Malaysia AI Workshop Led by Strategic Partner Spotlights Strong Demand for GPTBots' Enterprise AI Solutions  May. 27, 2025 17:21
articles.summary: GPTBots.ai demonstrated its no-code AI platform, showcasing solutions like ERP+CRM automation and multi-language customer service bots. The event, hosted by Zanroo Malaysia, highlighted the platform's potential and ease of use for various industries, signaling an introduction of new AI service capabilities in the Southeast Asia market.

articles.title: Sleep soundly and save with over $100 off this Tuft & Needle Foam Mattress
articles.author: P.J. McCormick
articles.summary: Tuft & Needle offers the Kin By Tuft & Needle Medium Firm 10-Inch Queen Adaptive Foam Mattress, which features adaptive foam for personalized comfort, breathable materials, and is CertiPUR-US certified. It is currently available on Amazon with a 20% discount.

articles.title: Tuesday, May 27th: Black Jar Honey Contest, The Jim Allen Group, Famous Toastery
articles.author: Trent Gilbreath
articles.summary: Stanley offers a potential gift option for Father's Day, suggesting a product aimed at impressing dads.

articles.title: Canadian drag queen superstar Brooke Lynn Hytes debuts Pride collection with Joe Fresh
articles.author: Aleesha Harris
articles.summary: Joe Fresh launched a limited-edition Pride Collection in collaboration with Brooke Lynn Hytes. The collection includes gender-free T-shirts, a tank top, and sunglasses, with prices ranging from $12 to $25. A portion of the proceeds will be donated to Pflag Canada.

articles.title: Cheeses, milk and yogurt: The new product line from Ramat Hagolan Dairy
articles.summary: Ramat Hagolan Dairy, under ZNLR ownership, has launched a new product line featuring Baby Mozzarella, Tzfatit, Brinza, Goat Feta, Delicate Bulgarian Cheese, Greek Yogurt 180g, Sheep Yogurt 180g, 24% Vanilla Cream, Chocolate Milk, and Banana-Flavored Milk Drink. The new product line includes a variety of yogurts, cheeses, creams and milk drinks.

articles.title: Bubble Review 2025: Best Products From the Viral Skincare Brand
articles.author: Lia Mappoura
articles.summary: Bubble Skincare initially targeted teens but now caters to a wider audience with gentle and effective solutions. The company's all-female in-house chemists create fragrance-free formulations suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin. Products like the Slam Dunk Hydrating Moisturizer Créme and Fresh Start Gel Cleanser are highlighted.

articles.title: The NBD 5K Digital Camera was $500, but Walmart has it for $161 in limited time deal
articles.author: Yzzy Liwanag
articles.summary: Walmart is offering the NBD 5K Digital Camera, a best-selling product, at a discounted price of $161. This camera captures 48MP photos and 5K videos, features autofocus, anti-shake, and vlogger-ready functionalities like a flip screen and built-in microphone, making it a portable and versatile option for content creators and hobbyists.

articles.title: The old wives tale that will instantly get rid of sweaty smells on your clothes and ‘works a treat'
articles.author: Paige Beresford
articles.summary: An old trick suggests using a 50/50 mixture of vodka and water as a deodorizing spray for clothes, furniture, and shoes. The high alcohol content in vodka kills germs and bacteria, removing odors effectively, and is presented as a solution by Martha Stewart. This technique offers a way to keep items fresh that cannot be easily washed.

articles.title: The new Moto Edge cranks up the rugged factor with IP69 and Gorilla Glass 7i
articles.author: Sanuj Bhatia
articles.summary: Motorola is launching its latest Moto Edge (2025) in North America, featuring a 6.7-inch Super HD pOLED display, MediaTek Dimensity 7400 chipset, and AI capabilities like Google Gemini integration. The phone includes a 50MP primary camera and a 5,200 mAh battery with 68W fast charging and will be available starting June 5, 2025, for $550.

articles.title: What's Possible: KERV + WBD On Making Shoppable Content Actually Work
articles.author: Alan Wolk
articles.summary: Warner Bros. Discovery (WBD) and KERV.ai have partnered to launch "Shop With Max," a shoppable experience for CTV, aiming to bridge the interactivity gap between social platforms and TV. KERV's AI technology will allow viewers to purchase items seen on screen across different retailers and price points, giving them control over their shopping experience.

articles.title: AdCellerant Expands to Canada with Powerful, Award-Winning Advertising Platform for Agencies and Media Companies
articles.author: Ad Cellerant LLC
articles.summary: AdCellerant launched its Canadian operations on May 27, 2025, offering its advertising technology, automation, and support to agencies and media companies across Canada. This expansion provides access to AdCellerant's digital marketing solutions, sales enablement tools, and support to Canadian entities.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 2025: Leaked Renders Show What Budget Flagships Should Look Like
articles.author: Al Landes
articles.summary: Motorola is set to release the Edge 2025 smartphone, featuring a curved display, triple camera setup, vegan leather finish, and a customizable Quick Button. The phone aims to provide better cameras, premium materials, and useful features at a competitive price point, potentially around $550, challenging more expensive flagship devices from competitors.

articles.title: 'Hassle-free' waffle maker cut down to £35 that makes 'perfect food every time'
articles.author: Eilidh Farquhar
articles.summary: Breville's Waffle Maker, featuring a DuraCeramic coating for scratch resistance and faster cooking, is available on Amazon at a discounted price. The machine is designed to make two waffles at a time with a clip system and has received positive reviews for its ease of use and perfect waffle production. Other options include the Global Gourmet American Waffle Maker and the Salter Kuro XL Deep Fill Waffle Maker.

articles.title: Shoppers empty shelves of Ring camera as price drops below £20 in rare deal
articles.author: Jamie Harris
articles.summary: Ring Indoor Camera is on sale at B&Q for £19, a significant price drop from its usual £49. This indoor security gadget offers features like live viewing, remote communication, a 140-degree viewing angle, and 9m night vision, including a privacy cover. Ring also offers subscription plans for enhanced features, with options like Basic, Standard, and Premium.

articles.title: FOLLOWING NATIONAL RESTAURANT ASSOCIATION SHOW DEBUT, NEXT ROBOT UNVEILS 'AL DENTE' AI POWERED PASTA AND RISOTTO ROBOT COOKING TO PERFECTION
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Next Robot is launching Al Dente, an AI-powered robot designed for cooking pasta and risotto. Al Dente offers features like auto-seasoning and intelligent cooking control, aiming for consistent quality in fast-casual restaurants and other food service establishments. Its production version is set to launch later this year.

articles.title: Origin Hybrid Pro mattress review: gigantic, firm … the James Bond of mattresses
articles.author: Jane Hoskyn
articles.summary: Origin has introduced the Hybrid Pro mattress, a hybrid mattress combining layers of springs and memory foam. The Hybrid Pro features a Tencel surface and is designed to provide strong support with cooling cushioning. Origin offers a 200-night free trial and a 15-year warranty for the Hybrid Pro.

articles.title: GoDaddy 2024 Sustainability Report: Customers & Communities
articles.summary: GoDaddy introduced the latest version of its WOW (WOW for Customer Care) program in 2024, amplifying their commitment to excellent customer care by incorporating flexible voice and messaging guidelines. GoDaddy is also using Natural Language Processing technology to streamline customer interactions and introduced GoDaddy AI Prompt Library , a free resource for small business owners to boost their business.

articles.title: Brits are ditching pressure washers for 'miracle' £27 patio cleaner that 'really works'
articles.author: Laura Mckenna
articles.summary: Wet and Forget Outdoor Cleaning Solution is introduced as a cheaper alternative to jet washers for cleaning outdoor surfaces and boasts over 25,000 reviews on Amazon. Spear and Jackson Spray and Leave and Sodium Hypochlorite Patio Cleaner are also mentioned as effective options for patio and driveway cleaning, available on Amazon.

articles.title: 'I don't like my body but this is flattering'
articles.author: Husna Anjum
articles.summary: New Look is offering the Pink Satin Floral print Ruffle Trim Midi Dress for £39.99. The dress, available in pink and green, features a wrap-around design, flutter sleeves, and is crafted in satin with a V-neck. The pink dress is available in size 16, while the green version comes in sizes 6-22.

articles.title: Tru by Hilton introduces meaningful prototype changes, expands global reach with over 300 open hotels
articles.author: Travel Daily News
articles.summary: Tru by Hilton is unveiling a refreshed prototype with updates designed to enhance comfort, flexibility, and the guest experience. This update comes eight years after the initial launch of the brand in 2016.

articles.title: 23 Makeup Products Under $10 That Are *Actually* Good
articles.author: Taylor Steele
articles.summary: L'Oreal introduced True Match liquid foundation and Catrice launched under-eye brightening concealer and face palette. Nyx launched tinted eyebrow gel and setting spray, while Essence launched mascara. Furthermore, E.l.f. Cosmetics introduced tubing mascara and liquid blush. Maybelline launched concealer and primer, Revlon launched face and body glow moisturizer, and Wet n Wild launched eyeshadow stick.

articles.title: Infinix wins User-Friendly Smartphone Brand of the Year at Beacon of ICT Awards 2025
articles.author: Premium Times
articles.summary: Infinix won the User-Friendly Smartphone Brand of the Year award at the Beacon of ICT Awards 2025. This recognition highlights Infinix's dedication to innovation, performance, excellent product design, and competitive pricing aimed at meeting the needs of modern users.

articles.title: Beko Announces Updates to HomeWhiz Platform to Advance Smart Appliance Efficiency and Sustainability
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Beko has unveiled updates to its HomeWhiz smart home platform, empowering users to operate and monitor connected appliances for sustainable living. The updated HomeWhiz includes adaptive features that personalize laundry experiences using AI, and provides enhanced energy and water management tools offering usage data and personalized recommendations. HomeWhiz orchestrates firmware updates (OTA) to ensure the use of new AI features.

articles.title: Beko Announces Updates to HomeWhiz Platform to Advance Smart Appliance Efficiency and Sustainability
articles.author: Beko
articles.summary: Beko has unveiled updates to its HomeWhiz smart home platform. HomeWhiz's updates include adaptive laundry solution, energy and water management feature that offers personalized recommendations and guidance, and firmware updates (OTA) that help consumers achieve greater energy savings and provide access to new AI-powered features.

articles.title: Discover King's Lynn app has exclusive deals for half-term
articles.author: Kris Johnston
articles.summary: Discover King's Lynn has launched its app, providing a platform for town information, including tours, news, and business offers. The app, named 'Discover King's Lynn', is available for free download on iOS and Android, featuring exclusive offers accessible to registered users.

articles.title: 32 Amazon Summer Fashion Pieces For Hot Weather
articles.author: Ana Maria Glavan
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a variety of clothing items including dresses, joggers, t-shirts, pajama sets, overalls and blouses. These items range in price and size, and feature various materials and designs suitable for different occasions and weather conditions.

articles.title: The Motorola Edge 2025 Is Here With an Extra Camera
articles.author: Joe Fedewa
articles.summary: Motorola is launching the Moto Edge 2025, featuring a triple-camera system with a 50MP main camera, a 50MP ultrawide lens, and a 10MP 3X telephoto lens, along with a 50MP front-facing camera. The device includes a 6.7-inch pOLED display, IP68/IP69 water and dust resistance, a 5,200mAh battery with 68W TurboPower wired and 15W wireless charging, and is powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 7400 with 8GB of RAM. The Moto Edge 2025 will be available unlocked in the US starting June 5th for $549.99 and in Canada on motorola.ca.

articles.title: Gibraltar Sea is out, Deep Forest is in.
articles.author: Allison Johnson
articles.summary: Motorola is launching the Motorola Edge 2025 in the US for $549.99. The phone features water resistance, three 50-megapixel cameras with 3x optical zoom, and a 6.7-inch display, and comes in a dark green 'forest' color with a faux-leather back.

articles.title: Versatility Redefined: Introducing the new motorola edge 2025
articles.author: Unknown
articles.summary: Motorola is launching the motorola edge 2025 in North America. This new product is designed to offer a balance of premium features at an affordable price.

articles.title: Dreams come true as major UK retailer opens new Bath branch
articles.author: Phoebe Hobbs
articles.summary: Dreams, a bed company, opened a new branch in Bath, located in Metro Retail Park. This is the first Dreams location in the city, expanding their product and service offerings to a new customer base. The new store has created five local jobs and operates seven days a week.

articles.title: Sonata Software and Qualtrics Partner to Transform Customer Experience for Global Brands
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Sonata Software and Qualtrics have partnered to offer a comprehensive customer experience management solution, integrating Qualtrics' XM platform with Sonata Software's system integration services and Sonata CX solutions. This collaboration aims to enhance customer experiences, personalize interactions, and improve operational efficiency for global enterprises by combining AI-powered feedback analysis with field-based measurement solutions.

articles.title: GoodData Launches GoodData AI: Embed, Extend, and Scale Analytics with AI
articles.summary: GoodData has launched GoodData AI, a new AI-native analytics platform designed for enterprises needing trust, scalability, and extensibility. The platform features an open Analytics Lake, an Intelligent Semantic Layer, and AI Anywhere, providing reliable insights directly within apps and workflows.

articles.title: Tapo's new $70 budget smart lock is packed with features
articles.author: Andrew Liszewski
articles.summary: TP-Link has launched the Tapo DL100 Smart Deadbolt Door Lock, a new budget-friendly smart home device priced at $69.99. The Tapo DL100 offers multiple unlocking methods, including a keypad, physical key, mobile app, and voice commands, along with features like pin masking, one-time codes, and compatibility with Tapo's smart doorbell.

articles.title: Samsung is handing out free Galaxy S25 mobiles - but rare deal ends tonight
articles.author: Harriet Morphy-Morris
articles.summary: Samsung is offering a free Galaxy S25 mobile phone to customers who pre-order one of its new TVs, with the promotion ending tonight. The deal requires using the code SPRING at checkout and is subject to availability, with some TV models already sold out.

articles.title: Samsung is handing out free Galaxy S25 mobiles
articles.author: Harriet Morphy-Morris
articles.summary: Samsung is offering a free Galaxy S25 phone with the pre-order of select new televisions using the code SPRING. The promotion is time-sensitive and ends tonight, May 27th, with limited stock available, and includes deals on models such as the 55" Neo QLED QN85F 4K Vision AI Smart TV.

articles.title: Samsung is handing out free S25 mobile to shoppers
articles.author: Harriet Morphy-Morris
articles.summary: Samsung is offering a free Galaxy S25 phone with the pre-order of its latest televisions, using the code SPRING at online checkout. This promotion includes models like the 55" Neo QLED QN85F 4K Vision AI Smart TV and is available for a limited time, expiring soon. The offer also included a double storage offer on its latest S25 Edge mobile.

articles.title: Samsung is handing out free S25 mobile to shoppers
articles.author: Harriet Morphy-Morris
articles.summary: Samsung is offering a free Galaxy S25 to customers who pre-order a new Samsung television using the code SPRING. The offer is time-sensitive and while stocks last, giving an advantage for customers looking into new TV models.

articles.title: Zong Inaugurates State-of-the-Art customer service center in Rawalpindi
articles.summary: Zong, a technology innovation company, has inaugurated its newly relocated and upgraded Customer Service Centre (CSC) in Rawalpindi. The upgraded CSC is part of Zong's broader strategy to strengthen its physical service infrastructure alongside its digital transformation goals.

articles.title: Ninja slushi created one of the best drinks I've ever made, but is it worth the money?
articles.author: Alex Aitcheson-David
articles.summary: The Ninja slushi is a new appliance designed to cool and mix ingredients into frozen drinks. It has a large capacity, making multiple servings of slushies, milkshakes, frappes and frozen cocktails. The machine chills ingredients to the point of freezing but prevents them from solidifying.

articles.title: OpenAI and The Surveillance Future
articles.author: angryea
articles.summary: OpenAI is developing a new device, in collaboration with Jonny Ive's design firm, that aims to capture user data continuously. This screen-less device will record everything and send it to OpenAI to improve their models and potentially replace human elements in industries like movie and television production.

articles.title: River Island's 'stunning' mini dress that's 'giving luxury'
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: River Island introduced the Green Premium Embellished Mini Shift Dress, priced at £150, featuring an abstract print, square neckline, and sequin and beading embellishment. The dress is being promoted on Instagram, where it has garnered significant positive feedback from shoppers.

articles.title: NR Vandana Tex Industries Launches IPO to Fuel Growth in Textile Market
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: NR Vandana Tex Industries Limited is launching a Rs. 27.89 crore Initial Public Offering (IPO) from May 28 to May 30, offering 61,98,000 shares priced between Rs. 42 and Rs. 45. The company aims to utilize the proceeds for working capital requirements and loan repayments, with shares expected to list on the NSE SME Emerge platform on June 4.

articles.title: Alcatel returns to mobile phones in India with a new range that focuses on reading
articles.summary: Alcatel is re-entering the Indian mobile phone market with its new V3 series of smartphones, featuring a patented NXTPAPER display technology for improved eye comfort. The V3 lineup includes five variants, ranging from the V3 Ultra 5G to the V3 Classic 5G, and will be available on Flipkart starting June 2nd.

articles.title: Aldi launches bargain beer dispenser on Specialbuys shelves this week – and it's perfect for Father's Day
articles.author: Allan Glen
articles.summary: Aldi has launched the Ambiano beer dispenser for £24.99, available from June 1st. This dispenser accommodates various can and bottle sizes and features a sleek design, powered by two AA batteries. The product includes a three-year warranty and is an alternative to the more expensive Lakeland Fizzics DraftPour dispenser.

articles.title: Fast fashion brand Newme launches 60-minute delivery service in Bengaluru
articles.author: ETtech
articles.summary: Newme has launched its 60-minute delivery service, Newme Zip, in Bengaluru, expanding from its initial launch in Delhi. The company plans to introduce the rapid delivery service in Mumbai and Hyderabad soon. This launch comes as quick delivery gains popularity in the fashion sector, with companies like Myntra also offering similar services.

articles.title: Else Nutrition Expands Nationwide with Kids Ready-to-Drink Shakes in 1,000 Leading U.S. Retailer Stores
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Else Nutrition launched its Ready-to-Drink (RTD) kids' products in 1,000 stores nationwide in May 2025. These clean-label Kids RTD products were initially launched in 2024 and have quickly gained traction among parents seeking nutritious, dairy-free, and soy-free options for their children.

articles.title: Next reduces 'no-iron' £52 FatFace dress 'for daytime jaunts' to £30
articles.author: Emily Sleight
articles.summary: Next is selling the FatFace Navy Ivana Jersey 100% Cotton Dress, originally priced at £52, for a reduced price of £30 in its clearance sale. The dress features a tiered design, stretchy cuffs, and is made from soft cotton. It has received positive reviews, with a rating of 4.5 out of 5.

articles.title: 'Miracle' outdoor patio cleaner sees Brits ditching pressure washers
articles.author: Beth Mahoney
articles.summary: Amazon is selling Wet and Forget Outdoor Cleaning Solution, a product that eliminates the need for a jet washer, which has received over 25,000 reviews. Alternative products like Spear and Jackson Spray and Leave, Sodium Hypochlorite Patio Cleaner, Electric Weed Sweeper, and Yard Force's LW CPC1 Cordless Patio Cleaner are also available.

articles.title: The Morning After: Our verdict on the Galaxy S25 Edge
articles.author: Mat Smith
articles.summary: The Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge, a thinner smartphone, has been evaluated for its battery life and camera capabilities. It boasts a 200-megapixel main camera sensor that can be used for cropping in the absence of optical zoom. The device aims for a thinner and lighter design, with compromises made to achieve this form factor.

articles.title: Dukes The Palm
articles.author: Staff Writer
articles.summary: Dukes The Palm launched its first all-inclusive option for its guests.

articles.title: Video first drive: 2026 Toyota bZ gets major makeover
articles.summary: Toyota's renamed SUV, the 2026 Toyota bZ, receives a major makeover. The SUV features big increases in power and range, along with new features. These changes position it as a significant player among small SUVs.

articles.title: This eco-friendly duvet is the secret to sleeping cool all summer long
articles.author: Sarah Bradbury
articles.summary: Simba has introduced the Simba Hybrid Duvet, designed for optimal sleep comfort with features like Stratos® Cool-Touch Technology and breathable Simba Renew Bio™ fibres made from recycled PET bottles. Customer reviews highlight its luxurious feel and ability to regulate temperature, making it a worthwhile investment for improved sleep quality. The Simba Hybrid Duvet is praised for its temperature regulation, lightweight feel, and machine-washable design, ensuring a comfortable and convenient sleep experience.

articles.title: New ownership focuses on customer service at Sault Nissan
articles.author: Katie Corcoran
articles.summary: Sean LaFleur, the new owner of Sault Nissan, emphasizes customer service and highlights Nissan's advancements in vehicle quality. New Nissan models, like the Murano and Rogue, are being compared to higher-end brands, suggesting updates or new product offerings.

articles.title: Almonds Ai and Mobavenue join forces to launch ChannelX
articles.author: Afaqs
articles.summary: Almonds Ai and Mobavenue have launched ChannelX, a new solution designed to improve how brands connect with retailers and other partners. ChannelX enables brands to display advertisements and promotions to their verified channel partners across various apps, aiming to increase reach and engagement by leveraging digital advertising platforms.

articles.title: Samsung newest Galaxy S10 FE now £15 a month
articles.author: Christopher Harper
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Tab S10 FE, a budget-friendly tablet, at £499 or £15 a month through Sky. The tablet features a high-res display with 90Hz visuals, Vision Booster for outdoor visibility, an included S Pen, an 8,000mAh battery, and IP68 water and dust resistance.

articles.title: Microsoft's Windows 11 is a detriment to handheld gaming PCs – and a recent SteamOS comparison highlights that
articles.author: Isaiah Williams
articles.summary: Valve's SteamOS shows a performance uplift of up to 25% in games like Cyberpunk 2077 on the Lenovo Legion Go S, compared to Windows 11. The devices use the same hardware (AMD's Ryzen Z2 Go or Z1 Extreme), making the operating system the primary difference in performance.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge review: Welcome to the light side
articles.summary: Samsung is teasing its Galaxy S25 Edge, which features a 3,900 mAh battery, Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, and a 1440p 120Hz LTPO AMOLED display with Ceramic 2 protection. The phone boasts a 200-megapixel primary camera and enhanced AI capabilities within One UI 7, aiming to challenge competitors like Apple.

articles.title: 'Amazing' waffle iron that makes 'perfect waffles every time' 35% off
articles.author: What's On Writer
articles.summary: Breville Waffle Maker is on sale for £34.98, featuring a non-stick coating and enclosed plate system. Lakeland offers the No Mess Electric Waffle Maker for £59.99, which can make four waffles at a time. VonShef Quad Waffle Maker is available at VonHaus for £29.99, designed with a non-stick coating and automatic temperature control.

articles.title: Top 8 Nike Air Jordan sneaker releasing in 2025: From Air Max 95 x WORKSOUT to Air Jordan 11 Low 'Igloo'
articles.summary: A product with a minimal and modern tech-leaning design will be available on June 5th at 9:30 am, priced at Rs. 17,495.

articles.title: Samsung hands out free S25 mobiles to shoppers that do this
articles.author: Harriet Morphy-Morris
articles.summary: Samsung is offering a free Galaxy S25 (standard model) to customers who pre-order select new TVs, using the code SPRING at checkout. The promotion is for a limited time and is valid for the 6.2-inch mobile, typically priced at £799. The promotion also includes the double storage offer currently being handed out on its newest S25 Edge mobile.

articles.title: Best soda maker
articles.author: Best Reviews
articles.summary: The article highlights several soda makers, including the SodaStream Aqua Fizz Sparkling Water Maker, noted for its eco-friendly and electric-free operation. DrinkMate Carbonating Bottle can carbonate various beverages beyond water and the Spärkel Beverage System includes fruit drops for flavoring sparkling water.

articles.title: Jeffs' Brands Prepares for Official Launch of Fort's AI-Based Pest Control App on the Apple iOS ...
articles.author: Jeffs' Brands Ltd
articles.summary: Jeffs' Brands Ltd, through its subsidiary Fort Products Limited, has launched the Fort app, an AI-powered pest control mobile application, on the Apple App Store. The Android version has been submitted to Google Play and is expected to be available soon.

articles.title: Realme GT 7, Realme GT 7T and Realme GT 7 Dream Edition Price, Specifications and Features Revealed, Know Everything About the Latest Smartphones Launched From Realme in India
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: Realme launched the Realme GT 7 series, including the Realme GT 7, GT 7T, and GT 7 Dream Edition smartphones, at a global event. The Realme GT 7 features a fibre glass back, while the Realme GT 7T comes with AI-powered features and a 6.78-inch display and powered by MediaTek Dimensity 9400e chipset.

articles.title: Jeffs' Brands Prepares for Official Launch of Fort's AI-Based Pest Control App on the Apple iOS and Android Platforms
articles.author: Jeffs' Brands Ltd
articles.summary: Jeffs' Brands Ltd is launching its AI-powered pest control mobile application, the Fort app, designed by its subsidiary Fort Products Limited. The Fort app is already available on the Apple App Store and is awaiting approval on Google Play, offering AI-driven pest identification and tailored treatment recommendations with Fort's pest control solutions.

articles.title: Next's 'perfect for summer' £25 midi dress 'never needs ironing'
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: Next is promoting their new "£25 Khaki Green/White Button Down 100% Cotton Cami Summer Dress", which is available in multiple colors and sizes. The midi dress has a button-down front, cami straps, and is made of cotton. PrettyLittleThing, ASOS, and New Look also offer summer dresses.

articles.title: Fragrance For Fathers
articles.summary: Tuesday Style Beauty (TSB) is introducing a Father's Day Gift Series featuring a curated list of fragrances. This gift guide aims to provide options beyond typical choices like Dior Sauvage, catering to different preferences like fresh, aquatic scents and spicy fragrances.

articles.title: 各执一词 加沙停火方案陷'罗生门' _新闻频道_厦门网
articles.summary: Sonic is introducing new all-natural lemonade drinks with flavored cold foam toppings like strawberry and blueberry lavender, starting May 27 via the app and June 2 in-store. Customers can customize their lemonade with flavor add-ins. The lemonade purchase supports Limeades for Learning, which aids public schools.

articles.title: Here's When You Can Watch New Episodes Of 'Nine Perfect Strangers' Season 2 In The UK
articles.author: Juliana Ukiomogbe
articles.summary: The second season of Nine Perfect Strangers is now available on Prime Video. The first two episodes were released on May 22nd, with new episodes dropping weekly on Thursdays until the finale on July 3rd.

articles.title: Realme GT 7 Launched With IceSense Design Technology; Check Specifications and Features of Latest Smartphone From Realme GT 7 Series
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: Realme launched the Realme GT 7 series, including the Realme GT 7, Realme GT 7T, and Realme GT 7 Dream Edition smartphones, at a global event. The Realme GT 7 Pro features a Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset and a new IceSense Design for enhanced heat dissipation. The Realme GT 7 includes AI-powered features, a 50MP AI travel Snap camera setup, and a 7,000mAh battery with 120W fast charging.

articles.title: Shopping with AI
articles.author: Staff Reports
articles.summary: OpenAI's ChatGPT now supports shopping on all plans, including the free plan, but users need to turn off web browsing feature. This differentiates it from Gemini, Copilot, and Perplexity, which accept sponsored results. The article suggests personalizing prompts for better shopping results, adding context like specific needs and timeframes.

articles.title: BMW introduces uniform pricing for i7 regardless of registration location
articles.summary: BMW India has introduced a unique offer for the BMW i7, providing a uniform pricing structure across the nation. Under this new offer, BMW India will bear the registration cost for the i7, which will be administered by authorized dealerships. This offer is inclusive of registration charges and GST, but excludes TCS, other local tax cess levies, and insurance.

articles.title: Assiduus Global: Building for a shopper-led future of e-commerce
articles.author: Gunjan Rajput
articles.summary: Assiduus Global helps brands scale globally across marketplaces, D2C sites, and retail partnerships. Their platform, Brand Central, manages the backend and frontend, from logistics and compliance to listings and performance insights. Assiduus aims to help brands stay in tune with their customers and improve brand performance.

articles.title: BoostBot: Influencer marketing tool
articles.author: Mazi
articles.summary: BoostBot, an all-in-one influencer marketing tool, streamlines and optimizes influencer marketing campaigns. It uses AI-powered search and outreach tools to facilitate the discovery, connection, and collaboration with influencers. The platform offers features like AI-driven influencer discovery with audience filters and enriched influencer profiles.

articles.title: Next's 'very flattering' £25 dress that's 'perfect for a summer day'
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: Next is receiving positive feedback for its new Khaki Green/White Button Down 100% Cotton Cami Summer Dress, priced at £25 and available in sizes six to 26. Other new dress options are available from PrettyLittleThing, ASOS and New Look.

articles.title: Next's 'flattering' and 'perfect' £25 summer dress 'never needs ironing'
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: Next is offering the Khaki Green/White Button Down 100% Cotton Cami Summer Dress, retailing for £25 and available in sizes six to 26.  The midi-length dress features a button-down front and cami straps, and is made of 100% cotton.  Customer reviews are mixed, with many praising the style and fit, while some criticize the sizing and shape.

articles.title: Next's 'flattering' £25 summer midi dress 'never needs ironing'
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: Next is launching the "Khaki Green/White Button Down 100% Cotton Cami Summer Dress", retailing at £25. The dress is available in regular and petite sizes from six to 26, and in red or black options. It features a midi length, button-down front, cami straps and is made with 100% cotton.

articles.title: Next's 'beautiful' £25 dress 'perfect for summer'
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: Next is offering a new Khaki Green/White Button Down 100% Cotton Cami Summer Dress priced at £25, available in regular and petite sizes. PrettyLittleThing features the White Crinkle Cup Detail Tiered Skirt Skater Dress at £38, while ASOS offers the ruched square neck tiered mini dress priced at £38, and New Look presents the White Floral Print Mini Dress for £31.99.

articles.title: Moments made manageable with smooth hair you can just fingercomb
articles.author: Brand Talk
articles.summary: Palmolive promotes its Naturals Ultra Smooth product, highlighting its ability to provide smooth, manageable hair. The "Palmolive Spot the FingerComb Promo" encourages customers to share their experiences and promotes the product's benefits, like time savings and ease of use. Palmolive encourages customers to visit its Naturals Facebook page for updates.

articles.title: Moto G96 key specs, design and colour options tipped online
articles.summary: Motorola is preparing to release the Moto G96, a new phone in its G series lineup, with key details revealed through recent leaks. The Moto G96 is expected to feature a curved 6.67-inch pOLED display, a Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 chipset, 12GB of RAM, 256GB of internal storage, and a 50MP Sony LYTIA 700C sensor. The device is rumored to be priced under Rs. 25,000 in India.

articles.title: I swear by a £1 household hero to banish stubborn stains in EVERY room of your home – it's so satisfying in your kitchen
articles.author: Senior Digital Writer
articles.summary: Astonish Original Cleaning Paste is reviewed and tested on various household surfaces, including pans, bathroom rust, showers, sinks, bedside tables, and radiators. The cleaning paste is available in major retailers such as Asda, Morrisons, The Range, Iceland, and Wilko, starting from £1.

articles.title: I swear by a £1 household hero to banish stubborn stains in EVERY room of your home – it's so satisfying in your kitchen
articles.author: Abigail Wilson
articles.summary: Abby Wilson tested Astonish miracle cleaning paste on various surfaces like pans, bathroom shelves, showers, sinks, and bedside tables. The product effectively removed rust, grime, and stains with minimal effort in less than a minute.

articles.title: I swear by a £1 household hero to banish stubborn stains in EVERY room of your home – it's so satisfying in your kitchen
articles.author: Abigail Wilson
articles.summary: The Astonish Original Cleaning Paste is introduced as a multi-purpose vegan and cruelty-free cleaning product, available in retailers like Asda and Morrisons for around £1. The product is highlighted for its ability to quickly and effectively remove grease, grime, rust and stubborn stains from various surfaces like pans, bathroom shelves, showers, sinks, bedside tables, and radiators.

articles.title: iQOO Neo 10 with Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 silicon launched in India
articles.author: Rohit KVN
articles.summary: iQOO has launched the Neo 10 series, a new premium mid-range smartphone in India. The phone features a 6.78-inch 1.5K AMOLED display, a Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 processor, a 7,000mAh battery with 120W fast charging, and a dual-camera system, and is available in multiple configurations and colors with prices starting at Rs 31,999.

articles.title: Absolut Vodka Sprite, Loisa Andalio invite you to embrace the unplanned
articles.summary: Absolut Vodka has launched Absolut Vodka Sprite, a premium alcoholic ready-to-drink cocktail that combines Absolut Vodka with Sprite's lemon-lime flavor. They are promoting it through surprise bar takeovers and pop-up events in the metro, encouraging spontaneous gatherings. The product aims to be a convenient and readily available drinking option for consumers.

articles.title: Want to try a TV game show? Need pastries? Try these new NJ venues
articles.author: Daniel Munoz
articles.summary: Optimum launched an interactive retail store in Paterson on April 28, offering internet, mobile, TV, and phone services. Great Big Game Show opened a television game show style venue in East Rutherford around April 19. Angelina Bakery had its grand opening on May 8 in Fort Lee, offering various baked goods and coffee.

articles.title: OnePlus Nord 5 launch timeline leaked: Expected to come in 3 colours, MediaTek Dimensity 9400+ chipset, 6,700mAh battery, 120Hz refresh rate, and more
articles.author: Anusha Jain
articles.summary: OnePlus is expected to launch the OnePlus Nord 5 in June or July, featuring a novel design with a pill-shaped dual rear camera, a 6.83-inch flat OLED screen with a 120 Hz refresh rate, and the MediaTek Dimensity 9400+ chipset. The Nord 5 may come in gold, black, and blue and is expected to be priced between Rs 35,000 and Rs 40,000.

articles.title: Skyworth K review: A car that's as effective as a household appliance, Lifestyle News
articles.summary: Skyworth Auto has launched its first car, the Skyworth K, an electric crossover SUV, in Singapore. The Skyworth K features a spacious interior, a 12.8-inch touchscreen, and an electric drivetrain producing 201hp. The car is priced at $179,888 with COE as of May 2025.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 50 Fusion now available for under Rs 17,500 on Flipkart
articles.author: Gargi Chaudhry
articles.summary: Motorola Edge 50 Fusion is a fashionable smartphone with a Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 chipset and IP68 certification for dust and water resistance. Flipkart offers this smartphone for less than Rs 25,000.

articles.title: NEWME launches 60-minute delivery service in Bengaluru
articles.author: Afaqs
articles.summary: Fashion-tech brand NEWME has launched NEWME Zip, a rapid delivery service, in Bengaluru, offering fashion orders within 60 minutes. This service, which has over 1,500 fashion styles available, utilizes a network of dark stores to enable faster order fulfillment. NEWME plans to expand NEWME Zip to Mumbai and Hyderabad in the coming months.

articles.title: Vibe shopping: How AI will change purchasing experiences forever
articles.author: Alon Huri
articles.summary: Google Israel's CEO, Barak Regev, highlights AI as a performance, productivity, and creative multiplier for marketers. Meta suggests that AI agents will actively participate in the buying process, changing online shopping via natural conversations and advanced assistants to personalize product searches. AI agents are transforming big-ticket purchases online, allowing virtual tours of cars and apartments.

articles.title: Oodie launches summer-ready cooling blanket featuring innovative fabric technology to keep hot sleepers cosy and cool
articles.author: EMILY SCRIVENER
articles.summary: Oodie has launched its summer shop, featuring a new cooling blanket priced at £99. The collection includes lightweight, breathable essentials such as cooling PJs and poncho towels, designed to keep users cool and comfortable during the summer months. Customers are already praising the new products for their comfort and temperature-regulating properties.

articles.title: Nourish Your Skin: The Best Soap Bars Guide
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: Just Herbs introduced Skin Brightening Bathing Bar enriched with Sandalwood and Turmeric. The Man Company launched Moisturising Soap with Murumuru and Kokum Butter. Softsens released Naturally Glowing Skin Cream Bar Soap enriched with turmeric, honey, and coconut milk. Qaadu launched Luxury Handmade Soap with cinnamon, orange oil, neem, and aloe vera.

articles.title: The Pitch: Advertising and marketing news for 5.27.25
articles.author: Jackie Di Bartolomeo
articles.summary: Arts & Letters worked on a campaign for client HubSpot, titled 'Impossible Growth Made Impossibly Easy,' showcasing HubSpot's AI tools. Xponent21 created an 'experience hub' for Energy Products Distribution, a digital tool featuring product galleries and technical specifications.

articles.title: AI: "The Next Big Leap Will Deal With Multimodality"
articles.author: Mirage News
articles.summary: OpenAI launched ChatGPT, which was a game-changer by converting a multitude of instructions into various outputs representing a given task. Anthropic launched Claude, and DeepSeek was launched in late 2024. These AI products impacted the maturity of AI technology and forced a shift of focus from all the big tech actors.

articles.title: Bank holiday deals on beauty gift sets from Amazon
articles.author: Lifestyle Writer
articles.summary: Amazon is offering amazing deals on beauty gift sets this bank holiday weekend. Benefit Premium Mascara, Brow & Pore Minimising Makeup Gift Set, Sanctuary Spa Perfect Pamper Parcel Gift Set, NEOM Perfect Night's Sleep Discovery Collection, Neal's Yard Remedies Bee Lovely Nourishing Collection, and Maybelline 5th Avenue Shopaholic Makeup Gift Set are among the top-rated bundles available, ideal for various purposes like gifting or self-care.

articles.title: Transforming Customer Interaction: Introducing iX Hero™
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Concentrix Corporation launched iX Hero™, an AI-powered tool designed to revolutionize customer service experiences. iX Hero™ streamlines customer interactions and provides comprehensive insights. Pilot implementations showed a 250% revenue increase and 13.5% customer satisfaction rise.

articles.title: Sunscreen Day: 8 Sun-Safe, Sweat-Proof, and Stunning Sunscreens To Beat the Heat
articles.author: Lifestyle Desk
articles.summary: The Body Shop introduced Skin Defence Multi-Protection Light Essence SPF 50 PA+++, an ultra-lightweight sunscreen with hyaluronic acid. Swiss Beauty launched Protect Maxx Sunscreen Air Mist, a water-resistant mist with niacinamide and sunflower oil. Other companies such as The Bath and Care, JOY, CeraVe, and Tikitoro also introduced new sunscreen products with unique formulations.

articles.title: New Balance is Selling Premier Running Sneakers for 23% Below Retail Price
articles.author: Kenneth Brown
articles.summary: New Balance has launched the FuelCell Rebel v4 in eight different colorways and in standard or wide width. These lightweight running shoe is available for $109. New Balance Fresh Foam Trainer sneakers are available in two solid colorways with reflective detailing.

articles.title: 30 Hidden Gems On Amazon You Haven't Seen Before
articles.author: Curtis Teegardin
articles.summary: Laneige launched Neo Blurring Powder for shine-free skin. Maybelline released volumizing brow mousse for achieving naturally full brows.

articles.title: Dance with a K-pop star? Wrestle a luchador? Airbnb to offer 22,000 experiences
articles.author: Airbnb Tns
articles.summary: Airbnb is expanding its services beyond lodging by introducing new offerings such as hair styling, cooking, massage, and photography. These new services represent a significant diversification of the company's business model.

articles.title: Samsung Electronics Introduces Its Most Advanced TVs and Soundbars Yet, Powered by Vision AI
articles.author: Media Outreach Newswire
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics Singapore has launched its 2025 lineup of AI-powered TVs and soundbars, including the Neo QLED 8K and 4K series which feature the new Samsung Vision AI. The new soundbars include HW-Q990F and HW-QS700F offering audio optimization to enhance the overall home entertainment experience. The Samsung Art Store is also available on 2025 Samsung Neo QLED 8K, Neo QLED 4K, and QLED models.

articles.title: Healthier, spicier, faster: Amoy Canning taps vegetarian and condiment trends in Asia
articles.author: Audrey Yow
articles.summary: Amoy Canning has launched a new line of ready-to-eat vegetarian meals and chilli crunch toppings to meet the rising demand for plant-based options and versatile condiments in Asia. The new products cater to health-conscious consumers and busy individuals, offering convenient meal solutions with Asian-inspired flavors.

articles.title: 33 Products That'll Help You With Your Home's To-Do List
articles.author: Melanie Aman
articles.summary: Wet & Forget introduced an exterior spray that fades stains caused by algae, moss, mildew, and mold buildup on stone walkways over time. The company is also advertising for shower cleaning spray. The cleaning solution offers a low-effort solution.

articles.title: Citykart's big haul; A new AI race
articles.summary: Citykart has raised Rs 538 crore to fund expansion. Nestlé SA acquired a minority stake in Drools, making it a unicorn. Furthermore, Google unveiled its coding agent Jules, and Microsoft launched its GitHub AI agent, indicating new product developments in the AI sector.

articles.title: Multiable Launches AI Agent to Revolutionize Document Management, Challenging Traditional DMS
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Multiable, a top ERP provider, launched an AI agent designed to displace traditional document management systems (DMS). This AI-driven DMS has been deployed in pilot runs across customer sites, showing promising results and uncovering innovative use cases.

articles.title: Whisky Of Distinction: Gordon & MacPhail, Mr George Legacy 1954 Glen Grant
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: G & M has released the fifth and final expression in its Mr. George Legacy Series. This expression is a Glen Grant single malt Scotch whisky matured in a first-fill sherry butt.

articles.title: Look Back: Have you ever wondered…?
articles.author: Bob Enoch
articles.summary: Gayetty's Medicated Paper, the first packaged toilet tissue medicated with aloe, was introduced in 1857 by Joseph Gayetty. In 1935, Northern Tissue advertised their product as 'splinter free'. The 'flashlight' was first patented in 1899 following the creation of the dry cell battery.

articles.title: How To Build An AI-First Company Without Losing Your Soul
articles.author: Aytekin Tank
articles.summary: Jotform utilizes AI to automate routine tasks, summarize user feedback, and prioritize bug reports, enhancing speed and customer support. They are integrating AI into their service to save customers time. Jotform focuses on integrating AI thoughtfully, with people at the center, improving their product development and marketing copy.

articles.title: Rewriting The Value Equation In The Era Of AI Agents
articles.author: Barry Libert
articles.summary: Google launched its 'Shop with AI' offering, an AI buying agent designed to control purchasing workflows directly, bypassing retailer websites. Microsoft also launched a new AI Agent Platform. These AI agents aim to transform customer interactions and industry processes, potentially replacing traditional software and services.

articles.title: The Future Of Clean Care: Building Brands Based On Integrity Not Hype
articles.author: Cathy Hackl
articles.summary: Humble Brands collaborated with Jason Momoa to introduce biodegradable, paper-based deodorant tubes. According to the brand, this shift drives 15% of deodorant sales. Humble is exploring bioplastics and experimenting with generative AI models.

articles.title: 5 Tools To Help Teen Entrepreneurs Sell Digital Products
articles.author: Sarah Hernholm
articles.summary: Platforms like Gumroad, Payhip, Canva, Notion, and Stan Store enable teen entrepreneurs to create and launch digital products such as templates, courses, and guides. These platforms help teens monetize their skills and passions while developing valuable business skills. WIT launched Pitch to Press, a digital workbook created using Canva, to help teen entrepreneurs gain visibility.

articles.title: iQOO Neo 10 launched in India: Top specs, price in India, key features
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: iQOO has launched its new Neo product in India. The launch includes information about the product's top specifications, pricing, and key features.

articles.title: Fast fashion brand Newme launches 60-minute delivery service in Bengaluru
articles.author: The Economic Times
articles.summary: Newme launched a new service in the national capital. The service offers a 90-minute delivery timeline.

articles.title: OnePlus AI revealed alongside Plus Key ahead of OnePlus 13s launch in India
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: OnePlus has launched its AI brand, OnePlus AI, for its smartphones on May 27. The company also unveiled new hardware alongside the AI features, facilitating their functionality, including an evolution of the OnePlus Alert Slider.

articles.title: Dusk Razor Launches Revolutionary Shaving Technology to Eliminate Irritation and Ingrown Hairs
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: A company launched an innovative safety razor. This razor offers a sustainable alternative to disposable razors. The razor comes with a 60-day money-back guarantee.

articles.title: The Nintendo Switch 2 has been spotted at retailers ahead of its June release - ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: The Nintendo Switch 2 has been spotted at US retailers. The Nintendo Switch 2 is due for official release soon.

articles.title: Upgrade your TV and Samsung will hand you a phone for free but there are ...
articles.author: The Mirror
articles.summary: Samsung is providing free Galaxy S25 mobiles to shoppers who met specific criteria before a given deadline. This indicates a promotional offer potentially linked to the launch or marketing of the Galaxy S25.

articles.title: Calgo Launches Mobile App to Support Distributed AI Computing Using Idle Device Resources
articles.author: Nasdaq Globe Newswire
articles.summary: A new app has been launched, enabling users to contribute their idle device performance to eco-conscious computing initiatives. This app represents a new service focused on environmentally friendly computing.

articles.title: Bob's Red Mill unveils new coffee cake mix
articles.author: Food Business News
articles.summary: A company has introduced a new addition to its Signature Blends baking mix line. This represents the launch of a new product within their existing range.

articles.title: McDonald's to close CosMc's cafes
articles.author: Food Business News
articles.summary: McDonald's will start testing new beverage products in its stores later this year. This initiative represents the initial phase of introducing these beverage innovations to the market.

articles.title: Eyeing the Dyson Supersonic Nural Hair Dryer? It's Now at the Lowest Price I've Seen
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Dyson is offering its hair dryer for $100 off for a limited time, prompting positive user feedback and driving product awareness.
